name: Bread bird
description:
Hey! thanks for looking at the bread bird page.

I made this for mini jam 99 but I'm dumb and made this in around 9 hours.

in the game you are a bird and you get bread by platforming!
it has very good special effects (trust me)  just look in image 3(ok they aren't good at all)

and the game definitely does not include vine booms as the death sound effect

but honestly it isn't amazing but I hope you enjoy it, I will patch it to make it better eventually.
